release.action: Added Markdown plugin to allow you to use Markdown syntax in your blog entries.

Updated Edit Blog Entries plugin so that when you add a new blog entry or edit an existing blog entry, you will be taken to the editing page for that menu instead of having to navigate the menus to edit the particular entry.

All available categories are now placed under the key BLOJSOM_ALL_CATEGORIES. This would allow you to display all your categories to your users in your templates, not just the categories available underneath the current category.

Added ResourceManager interface and implementation ResourceBundleResourceManager class which allows language packs to be developed for blojsom for localization. Language packs will be used to develop the administration interface.
Added a getISO8601Date() and getRFC822Date() methods to the BlogComment class for supporting Comment API.
Added rss and rss2 "-comment.?" templates (both Velocity and JSP) to support Comment API RSS feeds.
Added ability to submit a list of trackback and ping URLs when adding or updating blog entries.
Added field to allow you to set the name for the blog entry when posting through the web administration interface.

Added Excerpt plugin which allows you to add a
block to your blog entry and have a link automatically inserted to view the full entry. Depends on the show me more plugin.
Updated administration pages to use localized properties files for text.
Added GroovyDispatcher to the addon core source tree. This dispatcher would allow you to write templates using Groovy.
Updated the Sandler library to the new 0.6 release.
Updated the OSCache library to the new 2.0.2 release.
Added "cipher" theme courtesy of Kirk Peterson.
Updated the Edit Blog Properties plugin to allow the "blog-default-category-mapping" property to be configured. Also addressed an issue where the StandardFetcher would not pickup this property.
Updated Edit Blog Entries plugin to create a link to the new or edited post in the status message when adding or updating an entry in a category.
Improved handling of getDateHeader calls in Conditional GET plugin when a call can result in an IllegalArgumentException.

Comments and trackbacks can be disabled for individual entries. You need to run the Meta plugin before either of these plugins in one of your plugin chains. The metadata key to disable comments would be specified as "meta-blog-entry-comments-disabled=y" in your blog entry. The metadata key to disable trackbacks would be specified as "meta-blog-entry-trackbacks-disabled=y" in your blog entry. You can also enable and disable comments and trackbacks from the web administration console.
Added the Preview plugin back to the set of available plugins. This was "lost" in the blojsom 1.x to 2.x development. Oops!

Fixed issue where file upload under certain conditions would use the fullname for the upload file. Also added error messages to administration console where some errors were logged but not reported back to the browser.
Updated the RSS 2.0 templates to remove the core namespace according to paragraph 3 of the RSS 2.0 specification.
Added Atom <link/> tag to the Pumpkin theme.
Updated the Sandler library to the new 0.5 release.

Updated the Comment and Trackback plugins to support throttling. If throttling is enabled, comments and trackbacks left from a particular IP address must wait a configurable number of minutes before another comment or trackback can be posted.
New look and feel for the web-based administration console.
Fixed issue where Conditional GET plugin did not take latest entry comments into account when generating information to check to see if it should or should not send a 304 response.
Fixed issue where Abstract Calendar plugin would incorrectly rollover dates in certain situations.
Updated Compression (GZIP) filter code.
Fixed issue where category with space character breaks permalinks.
Modified setting of link to correctly encode '/'.
Updated MetaWeblog API handler to add other elements for the getPost() and getRecentPosts() methods. blojsom should now work properly with clients such as ecto which support the MetaWeblog API.
Updated MetaWeblog API newMediaObject method to correctly handle upload file and be multi-user compliant.
Updated Auto Trackback plugin to be more robust to handling of trackback URLs.
Updated Trackback plugin to check for null category before using category. This could've resulted in a NullPointerException.
Updated XML-RPC library to 1.2b1. This fixes decoding issues seen with the MetaWeblog API newMediaObject method.
Added patch for potential NullPointerException when loading BlojsomProperties.

Added getEncodedCategory methods to BlogEntry and BlogCategory. Also fixed handling of encoding for permalinks for categories with spaces to make sure feeds validate. Updated Atom template to handle encodedCategory for generating the id tag.

Updated comment plugin to allow for auto-formatting of comments. This will convert newline characters into
tags so that users leaving comments can create comment paragraphs more easily.
Added Conditional GET plugin for RSS aggregators that support this feature.
Updated e-mail utilities to explicitly set the send date of the e-mail message.

Updated the Wiki and Textile plugins to also check for metadata to specify whether or not processing should occur on a particular entry. You need to run the Meta plugin before either of these plugins in one of your plugin chains. The metadata key for the Wiki plugin would be specified as "meta-run-wiki=y" on a separate line in your blog entry text. The metadata key for the Textile plugin would be specified as "meta-run-textile=y" on a separate line in your blog entry text.
Updated the edit blog entries plugin to allow blog entries to be "scheduled" by specifying the date and time.
Fixed bug where calendar plugin does not correctly handle last day in month.
Fixed bug where Atom API servlet cannot handle search request.
Fixed bug where default XML-RPC handler will only be set for one user.
Updated administration plugins to report back status of operations.
Updated edit blog entries plugin to use the username of the person logged into the administration interface as the entry author when adding entries.
Updated file upload plugin to allow for deleting of files from the resources directory.
Updated edit blog entries plugin to allow one to delete comments and trackbacks from entries.
Updated the Atom API extension to use Sandler 0.4 library (Full Atom 0.3 support).
Updated blojsom to use the Sandler 0.4 release.

Updated loading of users so that if an individual user's configuration cannot be loaded, then only that user is not loaded. Previously, blojsom would not start if there was an error in a user's configuration.
Added a couple of new utility methods to BlojsomUtils.
Added Edit Blog Users plugin to allow a defined set of "administrators" to add and delete users.
Added Edit Blog Authorization plugin to allow you to add new authors to your blog.
Added Edit Blog Plugins plugin to allow you to edit the flavor-based plugin chains for your blog.
Updated Edit Blog Flavors plugin to persist changes to flavor configuration file. Users can now add, modify, and delete flavors.
Fixed issue where administration plugins could be accessed without authorization.
Fixed issue where the action the file upload plugin posts to was broken. Additionally, users could not upload more than one file to their blog.

Updated Weblogs Ping plugin to look for meta-no-ping-weblogs=true meta-data in a blog entry to signal it should not ping weblogs.com, weblo.gs, and Technorati. Also updated the plugin to ping Technorati.

Added ability to configure FreeMarker dispatcher using a properties configuration file. Use the freemarker-properties init-param in /WEB-INF/web.xml for the BlojsomServlet and specify the properties file to use. Example: /WEB-INF/freemarker.properties.
Updated Jakarta Commons Codec to version 1.2.
Added "Pumpkin" theme based on Cocoa Dev Central
Added supportsTrackbacks method to BlogEntry.
Preserved timestamp metadata on loading blog entries even if the original file timestamp has changed.

Added blog-default-flavor as a configurable parameter for an individual's blog.properties so that one can set a default flavor for rendering your blog. If not specified, the default flavor used is HTML.
Removed synchronized methods from Comment and Trackback plugins.
Moved administration plugin Velocity templates to separate directory under admin plugin package.
Added File Upload plugin to allow you to upload resources to your blog from the web administration console.
Added Edit Blog Entries plugin to allow you to edit blog entries from the web.
Added Edit Blog Flavors plugin to allow you to add new flavors from the web.
Added $default to xmlrpc.properties so that one can have a default XML-RPC handler.
Added FreeMarker dispatcher to allow users to develop templates in FreeMarker.
Added Jakarta Commons FileUpload 1.0 library.
Updated Radeox library to 0.9.
Updated OSCache library to 2.0.1.
Updated Atom templates to 0.3 snapshot.

Blog entry timestamp is preserved when saving an entry if the blog-entry-metadata-timestamp meta-data exists. Its value contains a long value indicating the date and time of the original timestamp. This meta-data is now populated through the Blogger, MetaWeblog, and Atom API handlers.
Updated Compression Filter to handle character encoding used for the blog entries.
Added Base Admin and Edit Blog Properties, Edit Blog Categories, and Edit Blog Templates plugins.
Updated Weblogs Ping plugin to use separate XML-RPC clients when pinging weblogs.com and weblo.gs.
Added version number to JAR files.
Added Compression Filter to send GZIP'd content.
Moved generation of trackback URL parameters outside of inner most loop so that they are not built each time a URL is encountered in the blog entry.
Fixed issue with weblogs ping plugin to be multi-user compliant. Also, the plugin will now ping weblo.gs using the same method as weblogs.com.
Fix for calendar navigation where when clicking the previous month in the calendar, then, after the new page loads displaying the previous month, the next month link is invisible.
Updated BlojsomConfiguration to automatically determine blojsom installation directory.
Atom API servlet now supports all Atom API operations.
Updated sandler to 0.2.
Updated OSCache to 2.0.

Added Trackback Auto-Discovery plugin to allow for a simple way to automatically extract URLs from your blog entries, identify those URLs with trackback links, and finally to send a trackback ping to each URL.
Added Simple Obfuscation plugin to allow for the obfuscation of data. For example, this can be used for obfuscating e-mail addresses on the comment page.
Added Added XPath and XPathSearch plugins to allow for XPath queries to be made against a blog.
Added forrest files to build of source distribution.
Added BlojsomConfiguration to parameters of BlojsomFetcher init() method.
Added CachingFetcher which can cache blog entries to improve blog rendering performance.
Added BlojsomProperties to properly load properties files in a specific encoding.
Added BlojsomSimpleLog4JSystem class to capture Velocity Log4J messages. As noted in the javadocs for this class, it will be removed once a particular bug in Velocity is fixed.

Updated VelocityDispatcher to use new-able VelocityEngine instance instead of global Velocity engine. This allows for a specific user template directory to be searched for Velocity templates along with the fallback to the Velocity CLASSPATH resource loader.
Updated BlojsomUtils to allow for other algorithms to be used when generating a string using a digest algorithm.
Added missing files to build of source distribution.
Added sandler 0.1 library.
Updated Atom templates to use escaped title and also added non-empty copyright.
Added support for multi-user with a single blojsom instance.
Added getEscapedBlogName and getEscapedBlogDescription to the Blog class.

Changed the "Show Me More" plugin so that if the cutoff length defined is less than or equal to 0 (<=0) that the full text of the entry will be displayed. The plugin's default value for the cutoff length is now -1.
Also added "BLOJSOM_PLUGIN_SMM_ENABLED" as a context variable output by the "Show Me More" plugin. If the plugin is used in a particular plugin chain, this variable will be populated with a Boolean object set to true.
Added meta plugin.
Added associated categories plugin.
The country code for the blog can be configured via the blog-country parameter in /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties.
Trackbacks can be enabled or disabled via the blog-trackbacks-enabled parameter in /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties. This is now a required parameter for trackbacks to be enabled or disabled.
Changed BlogCategory.setMetadata() to BlogCategory.setMetaData() to be consistent with the naming convention in other classes.

The blog-directory-depth parameter can now be overridden by specifying "depth" as a URL parameter. If this URL parameter is not present, it will use the value of the blog-directory-depth parameter that has been specified in /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties.

Duration of "remember me" cookies for the comment plugin can be configured via the plugin-comment-expiration-duration parameter in /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties. This parameter is specified as an integer value in number of seconds until expiration.
Initial implementation of the AtomAPI for editing entries. At this time only the fetching of entries is implemented.
Refactored method to get a blog entry filename from within the Blogger and MetaWeblog API handlers into the base AbstractBlojsomAPIHandler class.
Implemented the getRecentPosts method for the MetaWeblog API handler.
The blojsom site is now built with forrest.
Added the ability to disable the setting of the LastModified and ETag header by sending lastmodified=true/false on the request
Added NEcho 0.1 template to CVS
Changed AbstractBlojsomAPIHandler to throw BlojsomException for the setBlog() and setFetcher() methods
Implemented getPost() and newMediaObject() for the MetaWeblog API handler
Added Jakarta Commons Codec 1.1 library
Upgraded the textile4j jar to the latest version
Added and subsequently removed Blogger 2 API support. Blogger will no longer be supporting the Blogger 2 API or even develop Blogger to support the Blogger 2 API in favor of the Echo API
Added getDateAsFormat(String format) method to BlogEntry class
Fixed blojsom theme and shrubbery theme comment pages to output checked for "remember me" if this has been checked
The date format plugin was changed so that the date format object returned uses the locale that is constructed from the blog language set in /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties
Incorrect compareTo check in setLastReferral method
Comment plugin needs to check for author email and URL null
BlojsomServlet and BlojsomXMLRPCServlet now call the destroy() method on the fetcher in use
Added new Weblogs Ping plugin that will automatically send a ping to weblogs.com when new entries are detected
BlogCategory object on BlogEntry does not have meta-data
Fixed regular expressions in blacklist.filters
BlogCategory is now an abstract class
Added persistence methods to the BlogCategory class. This is overridden in a concrete implementation like FileBackedBlogCategory of this class to persist the blog category
Added public BlogCategory newBlogCategory() method to BlojsomFetcher interface
Persistence methods (loadEntry, saveEntry, deleteEntry) have been renamed to load, save, and delete on their respective classes to reduce redundance
Added new Date Format plugin to allow for configuration of blog date formatting

Added a new base class org.ignition.blojsom.plugin.common.IPBanningPlugin which the Comments and Trackback plugin now subclass from. This base plugin provides the capability to check if an IP address is banned or not through its boolean isIPBanned(String ipAddress) method. Check the upgrading instructions for information on how to ban IP addresses
Textile code removed and replaced with textile4j.jar
The Textile plugin had a bug when processing qtag's. This was found during the textile4j breakout
The prefix for the Comment and Trackback plugins is configurable via the plugin-comment-email-prefix and plugin-trackback-email-prefix parameters that can be added to /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties
No meta-data loaded when requesting "/" category
New blacklist.filter file contains regular expressions for use by extensions and plugins to filter content
An ETag header is now generated along with the Last-Modified header
New Really Simple Discovery (RSD) flavor provides support for tools like AudBlog
Added per-entry meta-data loading that defaults to loading Java properties-sytle meta-data from blog-entry-filename.meta
Added "Eclipse" theme courtesy of Dan Martin
Added "Shrubbery" theme courtesy of Andrew Crump
Normalized mechanism for blojsom to share certain templates across themes (e.g. trackback success and failure pages)

Added blog-file-encoding parameter to blojsom.properties so that blog entries/comments/trackbacks could be read and written using a particular file encoding. By default, blojsom uses UTF-8 as the file encoding
Added new class org.ignition.blojsom.BlojsomException and changed the 2 other exception classes to subclass from this root exception class
Added Blog as a parameter to the GenericDispatcher.init() method
All setXXX methods in the Blog class have been deprecated

Added loadEntry(Blog blog), saveEntry(Blog blog), and deleteEntry(Blog blog) to the BlogEntry class. These are overridden in a concrete implementation like FileBackedBlogEntry of this class to persist the blog entry

Added setAttribute(Map attributeMap) to the BlogEntry class. Concrete implementations of this class such as the FileBackedBlogEntry can use this method to allow attributes to be set on the subclass that are not defined in the BlogEntry class

Added public abstract BlogEntry newBlogEntry() method to the BlojsomFetcher class. This method is intended to be used to retrieve a new BlogEntry class appropriate for the particular Fetcher class that is used by the blog. For example, in the StandardFetcher class, this method will return an instance of FileBackedBlogEntry
Changed various methods in the StandardFetcher class to be protected so that they can be overridden by subclasses

Changed Blogger and MetaWeblog API handlers to use the new persistence methods on the BlogEntry class. This removes any strict dependency on these APIs from knowledge of the type of blog entry it is dealing with

The newPost() methods for the Blogger and MetaWebLog API now stores the poster's user id as entry meta-data. Template authors can now get the posting user id from the entry meta-data under the key, blog-entry-author
Implementation of the Blogger API getUserInfo() method to allow services like AudBlog to work

File extension for entries posted via XML-RPC is now configurable via the blog-xmlrpc-entry-extension parameter that can be added to blojsom.properties. If not specified, this parameter defaults to .txt
Persisted "Remember Me" checkbox value in Comments Plugin
Referer plugin filters previously saved referer log through the blacklist filter at startup
Referer plugin now utilizes the new blacklist.filter file to filter referer entries
Referer plugin was doing some detailed logging that it did not need to do so these debug statements have been removed

A new parameter "entry-cutoff-text" was added to the "Show More" plugin so that you can put, for example, a tag like <more/> to indicate the cutoff point for the plugin to insert a link to the full text of the blog entry.
Added check in the "Show More" plugin to catch an invalid number for the entry-length-cutoff parameter. It will default to 400 if the number is invalid
Added Google Highlight Plugin which will automaticaly highlight search words in your blog if the refer comes from a google query
Added Chrono Plugin which simply demonstrates how to sort entries in a different order
Added Preview Plugin (courtesy of Nick Chalko) which allows you to "hide" entries by including a configurable prefix at the beginning of the title of your blog entries
Added Textile Plugin which allows you to write entries using the Textile syntax
Upgraded Jakarta Commons Logging package to 1.0.3
Blogger API getRecentPosts sends invalid dateCreated
Aggregating "/" category leads to blank category name
Macro expansion plugin fails on non-lowercase keys
NPE in RefererLog Plugin when Blacklist file is not configured
BloggerAPI.getRecentPosts() returns wrong postid
BloggerAPI.deletePost() cannot delete entries with spaces
Support for the CommentAPI has been added. This API allows comment on blog entries from within aggregators
Trackback auto-discovery content (commented rdf document) has been added to permalink views, comment view and trackback views
The Comments plugin has been updated to do duplicate submission detection based on author name and comment body
All the templates have been cleaned up a bit, moving appropriate content out to the stylesheets to facilitate skining
Updated the JSP templates to include Search, Calendar Navigation and Referers (NOTE: Calendar uses the VelocityCalendarPlugin as a helper)
blojsom no longer displays entries in the future
Added category display to the output of the main index templates
Added "Remember Me" checkbox to Secondwave comment template
Added Map getMetaData() and setMetaData(Map metaData) methods to BlogEntry
RSS 2.0 feeds now include Dublin Core <creator/> and <publisher/> elements
RSS version changed to 0.92 as this is the version of the RSS specification output with the RSS flavor

Added the BlojsomFetcher interface and the StandardFetcher implementation of that interface. The BlojsomFetcher interface was added to allow for abstraction of the underlying datasource from which blojsom retrieves categories and entries. This would allow implementations to be written which cache or lazy load blog entries or retrieve categories and entries from a database
Blogger API handler renamed to org.ignition.blojsom.extension.xmlrpc.handlers.BloggerAPIHandler
Added trimming of whitespace for parameters to Trackback and Comment plugins
Added "BLOJSOM_LAST_MODIFIED" to session so that Last-Modified can be persisted when new comments or trackbacks are added
Corrected range checking for Entries Limiter plugin
Trackback plugin creates URL to comments page
HTML encoded return from Blogger API's getRecentPosts()
Add support for deletePost() to Blogger API
blojsom incorrectly sets last-modified
Upgraded Velocity from version 1.3 to 1.3.1
Upgraded log4j from version 1.2.7 to 1.2.8
BlojsomServlet now correctly falls back to blojsom-plugin-chain if <flavor>.blojsom-plugin-chain is not present in plugin.properties
Added "BLOJSOM_DATE_OBJECT" ( java.util.Date) to the context
VelocityDispatcher now calculates "Content-Length" header based on decoding the bytes as UTF-8
BlojsomServlet now explicitly uses "UTF-8" to decode URL parameters
Blogger API and MetaWeblog API handlers now use File.separator when writing a post
Added implementation of getRecentPosts method for Blogger API support
Changed Referer Log plugin to log each referer at the debug level rather than at the info level
blojsom incorrectly handles UTF-8
Added a new Search image to pretty up the search dialog. Thanks to Mark Pierce of Omnimodo for the image
Referer plugin has been re-written to allow tracking and totaling by flavor, as well as only showing today's referer's. See the Referer plugin documentation for more detail
Added a referer history page that display's all referer's (grouped by flavor) with no date filtering
New Calendar plugin that renders a visual calendar into your blog, hyperlinking dates that have entries

Calendar navigation code has moved to the new Calendar Filter plugin. If you want to continue to have calendar url navigation on your blog, please be sure to add this plugin to the start of your flavor plugin chain
New alternate theme for blojsom called 'SecondWave'. See themes on how to install and configure this new theme
New search input form in the HTML template to allow users to search your blog entries. This is simply a front end to the Simple Search plugin
Changed the BlojsomPlugin.process() method to also accept the HttpServletResponse to allow for plugins to manipulate things like cookies
Added the Send Email plugin that allows other plugins to send email messages
Updated the Comments plugin to send email to the blog author when new comments are added
Updated the comments template to fill in information if user checks "Remember Me"
Updated the Comments plugin to check for "http://" at the start of the comment author's URL (if provided)
Updated the Trackback plugin to send email to the blog author when new trackbacks are received
Fixed permalink filenames to be URL encoded
Fixed issue with not being able to determine entry title under Windows
Fixed directory (e.g. comment and trackback directories) filtering issues under Windows
Miscellaneous tweaks to the default CSS
Changed plugin.properties to reference the most commonly used plugins
Malicious HTML code can be posted into comments and trackbacks
Certain characters break HyperlinkURL plugin
blog-url context cannot be /blog/
Fixed issue with destroying plugins in BlojsomServlet when the servlet is taken out of service
blojsom not rendering comments
Added Map context parameter to the process method for the BlojsomPlugin interface. This will allow developers to add objects to the context for use in their templates

Added destroy() method to the BlojsomPlugin interface. This will allow developers to perform any finalization or cleanup activities of the plugin. Note that this method differs from the cleanup() method in that it is only called when BlojsomServlet is taken out of service by the servlet container. The cleanup method is called each plugin request after the plugin's process method is called
NOTE: "BLOJSOM_*" is a reserved namespace for the context
Added "BLOJSOM_DATE_ISO8601" to the context
Modified RDF flavor templates to correctly use the ISO 8601 date format
Clarified "BLOJSOM_DATE" and "BLOJSOM_DATE_IS8601" to be of type java.lang.String in customization
Added Emoticons plugin
Added code to the plugins that take configuration parameters to throw a BlojsomPluginException in init() if the required configuration parameter is not present
Changed blojsom.css to reduce the spacing between blog entries

Velocity templates can now be found in /WEB-INF/classes. They are no longer built and bundled as /WEB-INF/lib/blojsom-templates.jar since that way was not amenable to editing and customizing the templates by end users
Added setComments method to BlogEntry class so that plugins can manipulate blog entry comments
Trackback support added. See the trackbacks documentation for more information on Trackback support in blojsom

NOTE: You will need to add one parameter, blog-trackbacks-directory to your blojsom.properties file if you are upgrading from a previous version of blojsom. For example, you would add the following line to your blojsom.properties file:
blog-trackbacks-directory=.trackbacks

Added "entries" URL parameter to override the number of entries displayed on a page. entries=<-1 or integer greater than 0>. This parameter is listed with the other URL parameters accepted by blojsom in the installation documentation
Refactored comment handling to the Comment plugin
Calender access doesn't work on sub-categories
Fix for Calendar date access
Wrong number of entries displayed for categories
Blog category cannot have same name as servlet mapping
Added a text flavor. flavor=text
Added support for comments. See the comments document for more information on configuring comments

NOTE: You will need to add two parameters, blog-comments-enabled and blog-comments-directory to your blojsom.properties file if you are upgrading from a previous version of blojsom. For example, you would add the following two lines to your blojsom.properties file:
blog-comments-enabled=true blog-comments-directory=.comments
Added "BLOJSOM_COMMENTS_ENABLED" (see customization) as a request attribute to indicate whether or not comments are enabled for this blog
Enhanced security of permalinks such that only permalinks matching one of the blog-file-extensions will be returned
Methods on Blog that returned BlogEntry[] now return BlogEntry[0] in the cases where the method would return null
XML-RPC Handler supporting a subset of the metaWeblog API
Added "Referer Log" plugin
Removed Xerces XML parser as Java 1.4.x already contains an XML parser
Adding Comments does not render comments after post
Invalid permalink causes NullPointerException
Permalink request can be generated for arbitrary files
"BLOG_SITE_URL" no longer contains a trailing "/"
XML-RPC Interface (Additional Servlet) supporting a subset of the Blogger API
Initial Plugin API for blojsom
Servlet context name same as url-mapping makes invalid URL
plugin chain does not report errors
blojsom now requires Java 1.4.x as it now uses some of the Java 1.4 regular expression support
Added the blojsom favicon.ico file and references in the html JSP and Velocity templates
main.css was renamed to blojsom.css to avoid potential conflicts with existing style sheets
dispatcher-map.properties was changed to dispatcher.properties
Added Blog(Properties blogConfiguration) to the Blog class and removed previous Blog constructor
Removed intermediate category output in html JSP template
blog-file-extensions now takes a comma-separated list of regular expressions, rather than simply file extensions
Added blog-directory-filter to blojsom.properties, which takes a comma-separated list of regular expressions for directories to filter when generating the category list
Correctly placed requested category BlogCategory object on the context
Powered-by logo is now href'd to http://blojsom.sf.net
Images for RSS 0.92 and RSS 2.0 added with hrefs to the RSS feed for the current category
Each flavor has a <link/> tag for RSS harvesters
blojsom can now generate RSS 2 feeds. flavor=rss2
blojsom can now generate RDF feeds. flavor=rdf
Last-Modified header is now generated based on the most recent blog entry
Correctly loaded meta-data for categories that get placed on the request (the categories list and the requested category)
Added blog-owner and blog-owner-email to blojsom.properties
ClassCastException in rss.jsp
All URIs need trailing /
Available Category Links show twice on empty category
RSS Flavors not setting Content-Length Header
RFE 684341: blog-file-extensions -> blog-file-name-pattern
Needs personalization support in blojsom.properties

The in-memory blog cache was removed entirely. blojsom does not cache any of the blog entries in memory anymore. It was the cause of much frustration trying to keep the in-memory cache synchronized with the filesystem. It was certainly a "feature" that was contrary to the original zen and philosophy of blosxom
blog-reload-check was removed from blojsom.properties as there is no longer any more caching of blog entries in-memory
blog-entries-display was added to blojsom.properties to limit the number of blog entries displayed per category or aggregated when requesting the default or "/" category

blog-default-category-mapping was added to blojsom.properties to specify all (by leaving the parameter blank) or a subset (see customization) of your blog directories that should be aggregated when requesting the default or "/" category
whitespace lost due to readline
blojsom configuration parameters were moved from /WEB-INF/web.xml to /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties. This allows other projects such as blojsim to share blojsom configuration information

All of the blog-related functionality (e.g. building the blog entry map, looking up blog entries for a category, etc...) has been refactored into the Blog class. BlojsomServlet is now only concerned with processing requests for the blog
A per-category meta-data facility was added. This functionality is described in the customization documentation

Calendar-based navigation is now supported in blojsom. This means that users can add "year=YYYY", "month="MM", and "day=DD" parameters when requesting entries per blog category to see entries that fall under a particular date range. The year must be provided, but a user can narrow down the list of entries by providing a month and a day
Added "powered by" logo to the HTML flavor templates (JSP and Velocity)
No trailing slash in blog dir hoses category (URI) generation

URLs in RSS
JDK 1.4
Entry Titles with &'s
RFE 682499: blojsom is now built to blojsom-core.jar and placed in WEB-INF/lib
Initial release of blojsom
